price: Enti deε (boniayεfoͻ no) retwεn ara ne Nteamu fua pε no?. Ɛbεsͻ wͻn mu wͻ εberε a wͻregye akyinnyeε!
arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ تَأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā yanẓurūna illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhiṣṣimūna
